recipes.label: Trailing Shadows
recipes.startdescription: I have acquired shadows that are not my own. My contacts rely on my discression. If I wanted to meet them to discuss business, I should find an unwatched route. [Approach this challenge with Edge or Moth.]

recipes.label: Trailing Shadows
recipes.startdescription: I have acquired shadows that are not my own. My contacts rely on my discression. If I wanted to meet them to discuss business, I should find an unwatched route. [Approach this challenge with Edge or Moth.]

recipes.label: A Way In
recipes.description: I unlatch a window in the back, and make my way into the house unseen by sources outside or in. Now the trick is not to scare my contact.

recipes.label: Cut Off!
recipes.description: My route is blocked! I have to cut my losses and return another day.
